duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform individualized nursing care for patients/families under the direction of an RN.
Use and practice basic assessment data collection, participate in planning, and execute interventions in accordance with the Plan Of Care.
Contribute to the evaluation of outcomes and communicate to ensure patient/family educated Plan Of Care and planned treatments.
Collect assessment data per department guidelines of care, including age/cultural specific considerations and document data collected.
Communicate with other healthcare team members to coordinate patient care activities, workflow, and patient progress.
Implement plan of care per department guidelines, refer practices outside of scope to RN and seek out resources when appropriate in new situations.
Give constructive feedback to peers regarding work performance and notify supervisors of suspected performance issues.
Encourage patient and family participation in decision making and act to uphold individual/family rights.
Identify learning needs including barriers/readiness, recognize barriers to communication with patient and family and seek interdisciplinary expertise to establish a therapeutic relationship.
Demonstrate understanding of patient/family goals and make recommendations to the multidisciplinary team in development of the patient's plan of care.
Collect data indicative of patient/family response to care per department guidelines and contribute observations and data to patient care conferences.
Document patient and family care needs through documentation per department/entity guideline of care and policies and procedures.
Evaluate patient and family learning through use of adult-learning theory and revise plan as appropriate.

education_certification.credential: 1 Year LVN experience in an acute care setting or related area. AHA Basic Life Support for Healthcare Professional (AHA BLS Healthcare) - American Heart Association -REQUIRED. California Licensed Vocational Nurse (LVN) - CA Board of Vocational Nursing & Psychiatric Technicians -REQUIRED. Vocational Nurse IV Therapy/Blood Withdrawal Certification - Various-Employee provides certificate -PREFERRED
